headline: EPAM Systems (EPAM): Rethinking Valuation After a Recent 18% Share Price Rebound
summary: EPAM Systems (EPAM) has quietly climbed about 18% over the past month, even though the stock is still down sharply over the past year. That combination usually gets value focused investors leaning in. See our latest analysis for EPAM Systems. Despite the recent 30 day share price return of 18.01% lifting EPAM to about $192.99, the year to date share price return remains negative and the 1 year total shareholder return of minus 19.76 percent shows that longer term momentum is still rebuilding...
